domo.educational.inheritance

Interface Sensor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CamSensor, ResettableSensor, SensorImpl

    public interface Sensor
    Author:
    Stefano Falzaresi Stefano.Falzaresi2@studio.unibo.it The interface "Sensor" define the main requirements of a generic sensor, the user with getter methods is able to get the id,name,alert status and alert count of it and with setters method of course he can set it. When the object is created the alert status is set to false.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAlertCount()
      this method return the count of the alerts.
      int getId()
      This is the id getter method.
      java.lang.String getName()
      the name getter method.
      boolean isInAlert()
      this method return the alert status.
      void setAlert(boolean alert)
      this method set the alert status and, if the alert is "true" and the previous status was "false" the alert count will be incremented by one
      void setId(int id)
      Setter method for set the device id.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Setter method for the sensor name.

        this method return the alert status.

        the alert status

      • setAlert

        void setAlert(boolean alert)
        this method set the alert status and, if the alert is "true" and the previous status was "false" the alert count will be incremented by one
        Parameters:
        alert - a boolean alert status
